learn:
This section is where you’ll organize and define your releases as well as upload the digital files that you’ll be using throughout your campaigns. Think songs, albums, photos, videos, etc.

Once you've added a release or file you can also generate download codes for it.

Note: if you’re adding an album zip file you can also add cover art, photos, liner notes, even videos in the ZIP file.

copy.firstuse: Assets is where you'll define your releases and upload the files you'll be using in your campaigns. Before you can begin adding any assets you will need to connect to one of the 3rd-party storage platforms below.
